data.value: Compute the nth derivative of the Bessel function
The derivative is computed using the relation DLFM 10.6.7 .
Argument at which to evaluate the derivative
Order of derivative. For 0 returns the BEssel function
nth derivative of the Bessel function.
Compute derivatives of Bessel functions of the second kind.
Compute the Bessel function of the second kind of order 0 and its first two derivatives at 1.
Compute the first derivative of the Bessel function of the second kind for several orders at 1 by providing an array for
Compute the first derivative of the Bessel function of the second kind of order 0 at several points by providing an array for
Plot the Bessel function of the second kind of order 1 and its first three derivatives.
